name: Prayer
description: “Through namaz, a Muslim is standing before the sight of Allah and in attendance, submitting to Allah's will”, so i say prayer 5 times in a day.

name: Coding Practice
description: Since i have joined web development course in programming hero, so every day i have to manage 8 hours for watching the tutorials and practice.

name: Meditation
description: Meditation brings inner-peace. It reduce stress, controls anxiety, addictions, pains,pressure,memory-loss. As a programmer i must have to do meditation.

name: Exercise
description: Exercise is so important to be fit. So i keep some times to do exercise everyday. Physical strength gives us mental support.

name: Business Workout
description: All working days i visit to our business institution to help my father in his business. I a son i love to help my parents.

name: Family Hour
description: I believe family is the most important unit of my life. So how much busy i could be, i always keep at least an hour just only for my family. At that time, no social media, no work.
